alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 28 at 8:46PM PST until November 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Willapa Hills and South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills
